files.patch:
@@ -56,1 +56,9 @@
-        bash make/build.sh --jdk "$JAVA_HOME_17_X64"
+        retry=0
+        while ! bash make/build.sh --jdk "$JAVA_HOME_17_X64"; do
+          retry=$[$retry+1]
+          if [ $retry -gt 3 ];then
+            echo >&2 "JTReg is failing to build"
+            exit 1
+          fi
+          sleep 30
+        done
